text: Are you trying to query for contacts created during that time period?

Yeah so your auth url is a little messed up.
The first part is right but I don't know what the state is and you also don't have a redirect url would you try something like this: <https://app.HubSpot.com/oauth/authorize?client_id={clientid}&scope={scopes}&redirect_uri={REDIRECT_URI}>
and remember that you need to list all the scopes that are in you app settings
Yeah you can do this using the normal companies api, here's the link to the docs: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/companies>
You might need to wait a minute after you create the company for those types of details to populate
yes the app in already install on my account

My usecase is i am trying to generate access token using Oauth 2.0.
While generating, in the consent page its asking to accept or cancel, after click on cancel still i am able to generate the access token.
HubSpot sends code without any extra information to redirect the URL, even if cancelled.The response is same for both success and cancelled Authentication .
